summary: Increases the amount of gold dropped by bandits and such, as well as the amount you find in gold purses and containers.
descriptionHtml:
This is an extremely simple mod that increases the amount of gold you find in the world. That includes npcs, containers and gold purses. The increase is 10x, which sounds like a lot, but I think the normal drop amount is anywhere between 1 and 45. So this mod increases that amount to between 10 and 450, with higher amounts being rarer (which is a vanilla setting).

I made this mod because I\'ve been using mods that make buying and selling very harsh, and I don\'t much enjoy stripping every body I find bare just so that I can sell their stuff. I\'d rather just loot gold instead, but the normal gold drops are pitiful. I couldn\'t find any other mod that changes this, so I did it myself.

Anyone is welcome to do anything you want with this mod. It\'s very simple and easy to edit if you want to change the amount in the creation kit. I\'m still testing this but it might be the case that 10x is far too much so I may create and upload a smaller amount like 2x or 5x. If anyone knows how to make an MCM mod that can adjust these settings in-game, that\'d be awesome.
author: jahmon808
